entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as someone who is emotional and upset, breaking down in tears when talking to Ron about Scabbers. She is also shown to be apologetic and remorseful for what happened.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as someone who is relieved that Hermione has let go of him, and he tries to downplay the significance of Scabbers' death. He also seems to be trying to make light of the situation.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is described as Ron's pet rat, who has died. Hermione is upset about this and apologizes for her role in Scabbers' death.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as someone that Harry, Ron, and Hermione can talk to during Care of Magical Creatures lessons. He seems numb with shock at the verdict.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is described as someone who stood up and gave a speech, influencing the Committee's decision. He is mentioned in a negative light.
